comments:
Build 20020501

If I cut my workbench rather than moving it to trash on Linux motif and then
startup and import a plug-in I will get an NPE exiting. Note that the build
failed  due to all of the extra files that were lurking around.

STEPS
1) Open Nautilus and cut your workbemch directory
2) Restart Eclipse
3) Import org.eclipse.ui with source from the plug-in
4) Build will fail due to metadata update problems.
5) Exit eclipse - this exception is on the console

Do you have the stack trace from your problem in #4?
It was a could not write metadat error but I do not have the trace.

The log file should be cumulative now (doesn't delete itself per session 
anymore). It the data at the beginning of the file?
I had no log file - only what was spewed to the console
Could not reproduce with 2.1 RC1 candidate build.
